values: 洗；洗涤；冲洗（伤口等）；（水）漫过；淘洗；（风）吹拂；（光）洒落；使湿透；不褪色；耐洗
洗涤；正洗的衣物；要洗的衣物；（涂料的）薄涂层；<美>（对对立双方均无益处的）形势（或结果）；（船驶过划出的）波浪；（尤指用于清洗皮肤的）洗药；清洁剂；（水流的）冲积物；浅水沙滩

synonym.mean: 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 洗涤；洗涤剂；要洗的衣物
水分多的；淡的；多水的；无力的

word_group.brief_definition: 公开谈论个人的事, (尤指)家丑外扬
word_group.phrase: wash your dirty linen in public

word_group.brief_definition: 彩色涂料；彩色胶画颜料

bilingual.source: Do you wash your clothes on the weekend?
We don't have time to wash the things.
bilingual.target: 我们没有时间洗这些东西。

bilingual.source: Do you often wash your clothes on the weekend?
I often clean my room and wash my clothes.
bilingual.target: 我经常打扫房间和洗衣服。

bilingual.source: Wash the raisins, walnuts, and longan fruit.
bilingual.target: 洗净葡萄干、核桃和龙眼。

bilingual.source: From sunrise to sunset Hutun made Maha wash.
bilingual.target: 从日出到日落，胡顿让玛哈洗东西。

bilingual.source: Wash the rice, millet, peanuts, red beans, and mung beans.
bilingual.target: 洗净大米、小米、花生、红豆和绿豆。

list.abstract: wash（英 [wɒʃ]，美 [wɑːʃ]），英语单词，作动词为洗；冲洗；冲掉。作名词为洗；洗涤；尾流。例句为“We need to wash our jeans every day（我们需要每天洗牛仔裤。）。”短语搭配有washing machine（洗衣机）、wash the dishes（洗盘子；洗碗盘；洗盘碟）。 wash的近义词有laundrying、lavation等。

yingyinNormal.en: First, we have to wash them!
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我们要把他们洗干净。

yingyinNormal.en: First, we have to wash them!
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我们要把他们洗干净。

yingyinNormal.en: First, we have to wash them!
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，我们要把他们洗干净。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George help Granny Pig wash the vegetables.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩琪和乔治帮猪奶奶洗蔬菜。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George help Granny Pig wash the vegetables.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治帮猪奶奶洗蔬菜。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George help Granny Pig wash the vegetables.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩帕和乔治帮猪奶奶洗蔬菜。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. Don't worry! We'll just wash it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢。别担心！我们可以把它洗洗。

yingyinNormal.en: Also mine. Oh, my gosh, they must have shrunk them in the wash. Did they wash them 40,000 times?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那也是我的。天呐，他们肯定是用水洗导致衣服都缩水了，他们洗了4万遍吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Mason, please, don't leave me that dirty dish to wash. I do dishes all day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 梅森，求你了，别把那个脏盘子留给我来洗。我整天都在洗盘子。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has some warm soapy water to wash the car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸接了一些可以用来洗车的温水。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has some warm soapy water to wash the car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸接了一些可以用来洗车的温水。

yingyinNormal.en: It's got a bit muddy. So we wash it. And it all went a bit wrong. Sorry, Daddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它沾上了一点点泥。所以我们把它洗了。但是洗的时候出了一点问题，对不起，爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: They might as well have dragged this thing through a car wash.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们可能带着这玩意过了一趟洗车房。

yingyinNormal.en: Al washes a car in six minutes. Fred washes the same car in eight minutes. How long does it take Al and Fred to wash the same car together?
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾尔花6分钟洗了一辆车，弗莱德洗同一辆车用了8分钟。如果艾尔和弗莱德一起洗同一辆车要花多少时间呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I'll clean your place. I'll do the shopping. I'll even wash your clothes. Is it a deal?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我给你打扫屋子，出门采购，我还会给你洗衣服，干不干？

yingyinNormal.en: We splashed Daddy's football shirt with mud. Oh. Don't worry. We'll just wash it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸的足球服被我们弄脏了，上面都是泥。别担心！我们洗一下就好。

yingyinNormal.en: So your assignment today is to wash a car, together. With him? Especially with him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你们今天的任务是齐心协力洗辆车。跟他一起？尤其要跟他一起。

yingyinNormal.en: Did you know that, per our roommate agreement, I have to wash my feet before I get in the shower?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们知道吗，我们的室友协议里面规定，我必须在洗澡前先把脚洗干净？

yingyinNormal.en: You don't wanna wash that. No? No, that's silk. Seriously, what would you do without me? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可不能这么洗。不能吗？不能，这是丝织品，老实说，没有我你可怎么办哦？是啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Unless you count the bikini car wash I did in high school. But you already made me take that off my resume.
yingyinNormal.zh: 除非我在高中时穿着比基尼洗车也算，但你叫我把这段从我简历上删掉了。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 冲走; 流过; 冲积物

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 洗；洗涤；要洗的衣物；刚洗好的衣物

word_family.mean: v. 洗；冲洗；冲掉；冲走；粉刷；涂刷；涂颜料于；站得住脚；经得起检验

sense_info_list.zh: 冲走; 流过; 冲积物

examination_example.sentence: A badly run "year of culture" <highlight>washes</highlight> in and <highlight>washes</highlight> out of a place like the tide, bringing prominence for a spell.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运作不力的“文化年”如潮水般在一个地方涌进涌出，带来一时的风光。

examination_example.sentence: These labels encourage style-conscious consumers to see clothes as disposable — meant to last only a <highlight>wash</highlight> or two.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些品牌鼓励注重时尚的消费者将衣服视为一次性的——意味着只能洗一两次。

word_usage.usage: 洗衣机的两种说法：washing machine 较正式， washer 非正式。

direction_info.description:

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 洗涤者；洗涤器；垫圈；洗衣机；汽车挡风玻璃刮水器；洗脸毛巾
adj. 未洗的；未被冲刷的

word_family.mean: v. 洗；冲洗；冲掉；冲走；粉刷；涂刷；涂颜料于；站得住脚；经得起检验

word_usage.usage:
wash作不及物动词，表示主语的某种属性时，用主动形式含有被动意义。
示例：This sweater washes well.
这件套衫很耐洗。

examination_example.sentence: We had to have a bit of a production line going, making up "tiger milk", <highlight>washing</highlight> baby bottles, and cleaning the floors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们不得不让生产线运转起来，比如制作“虎奶”、清洗幼崽奶瓶和清洁地板。

examination_example.sentence: You are responsible for <highlight>washing</highlight> out your own lab equipment and putting it away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你有责任把自己的实验室设备洗干净并放好。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 洗；洗涤；要洗的衣物；刚洗好的衣物

word_family.mean: v. 洗；冲洗；冲掉；冲走；粉刷；涂刷；涂颜料于；站得住脚；经得起检验

examination_example.sentence: Besides, they <highlight>wash</highlight> clothes faster than I do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，他们洗衣服比我快。

examination_example.sentence: We need to <highlight>wash</highlight> our jeans every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要每天洗牛仔裤。

examination_example.sentence: A rush of newfound happiness <highlight>washed</highlight> over her.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新发现的幸福如潮水般涌上她的心头。

examination_example.sentence: We know that many children can't <highlight>wash</highlight> clothes or cook.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们知道许多孩子不会洗衣服或做饭。

examination_example.sentence: Doctors tell us to <highlight>wash</highlight> our hands before and after every meal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生告诉我们饭前饭后要洗手。

examination_example.sentence: Meals are cooked and clothes are <highlight>washed</highlight> as if by magic!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 饭菜烧好了，衣服洗好了，就好像施了魔法一样!

word_usage.usage:
wash作不及物动词，表示主语的某种属性时，用主动形式含有被动意义。
示例：This sweater washes well.
这件套衫很耐洗。
